GRAND RAPIDS, Mich. (WILX) - A more contagious COVID-19 strain has been reported in a third Michigan county for the first time.

articles.title: COVID-19 in South Dakota: 98 total new cases; Death toll rises to 1,809; Active cases at 2,316 - KELOLAND.com
articles.description: The South Dakota Department of Health reported five new deaths due to COVID-19 in Sunday’s update.
articles.content:
SIOUX FALLS, S.D. (KELO) The South Dakota Department of Health reported five new deaths due to COVID-19 in Sunday’s update.
